text.section: Subject to the provisions of this section, an applicant who fails an examination given under § 21-304 of this subtitle may retake the examination.

section.section: The Board may not limit the number of times an applicant may take an examination.

The Board may adopt regulations to set conditions for retaking the examination, including a requirement that the applicant:
wait a reasonable period between examinations; and
prepare to retake the examination in a specified manner.

The Board shall set fees for reexamination so that:
the fee for reexamination on the entire examination does not exceed the cost of the required reexamination; and
the fee for reexamination on less than the entire examination is less than the fee set for the entire examination.
